H0.text: Medications can slow down the increase of viruses in the blood.

H1.text: Platelets can slow down the increase of viruses in the blood.

H2.text: Infections can slow down the increase of viruses in the blood.

H3.text: Androgens can slow down the increase of viruses in the blood.

A4.text: Zanamivir and oseltamivir prevent the release of viral particles by blocking neuraminidase on the surface of flu viruses.

A5.text: Interferons inhibit viral synthesis in infected cells.
